content.rendered:
Directed by Rajkumar Hirani

Written by Abhiruchi Chand. Rajkumar Hirani. Abhijat Joshi

Cast Ranbir Kapoor (Sanjay Dutt ‘Sanju’). Paresh Rawal (Sunil Dutt). Manisha Koirala (Nargis Dutt). Vicky Kaushal (Kamlesh Kanhaiyalal Kapasi). Dia Mirza (Manyata Dutt). Anushka Sharma (Winnie Dias). Sonam Kapoor (Ruby). Jim Sarbh (Zubin Mistry). Karishma Tanna (Pinky). Boman Irani (Ruby’s father & Dr. Asthana of Munna Bhai MBBS). Ashnoor Kaur (Young Priya Dutt). Siya (Priya Dutt (as Aditi Gautam)). Tabu (Self). Sayaji Shinde (Bandu Dada). Steven Allen (Red jacket kid). Prakash Belawadi (Newspaper Editor). Mahru Sheikh (Ruby’s Mother). Anil Charanjeett (Dancer / Singer in the song main badiya you badiya). Nilesh Divekar (Bandubhai’s man (as Nilesh Diwekar)). Sanjay Dutt (Self). M.L. Josepher (Stripclub Manager). Mahesh Manjrekar (Self). Javon Q Minter (Boombox Kid). Piyush Mishra (Tripathi). Ashwin Mushran (Security Officer).Nawab Shah. Anjan Srivastav (Minister). Yuri Suri (Lawyer asking Sanjay Dutt to acccept about blasts and flee the country). Rachit Trehan (Kamlesh’s Friend). Robert Dobson (Bodyguard) . Ali Abbas (Bike man). Mukesh Agrohari (Goon). Backagaindancer (Sunny).Naveen Kumar Bhaskar. J Ryan Carroll (Jack). Abhijit Chitre (Mohammed). Karolin Etzel (Rehab Dance Instructor). Syed Firdaus (Goon). Gabriel Georgiou (Airplane passenger). Amitabh Krishna Ghanekar (Abdul). Paige Grimard (Bartender / Dancer). Vyas Hemang(Hanif Kadawala (as Hemang Vyas)).Arti Joshi. Shonita Joshi (Airhostess). Sef Khan (Kamlesh’s Friend). Abhishek Khanna (Sanjay Dutta Fan). Prince Kohli (Sanju’s Friend). Durgesh Kumar (Postman). Jandre le Roux (Rehab Doctor). Scott Milburn (Kamlesh Friend). Gaurav More (Spotboy while shooting the song Kya Yahi Pyar Hai).Parnalekha. Umair Patel (Musical Artist). Deepak Rai (Barber). RoksolanaHasekiHÃ¼rrem (Bartender (credit only)). Bajpai Sharad (Reporter). Harsh Shashwat (PR partner). Kishor Chandra Shrivastav (Police Officer, Arrests and Interrogates). Deependra Singh (Drugs Dealer). Samiran Singh (Singer). SkaterrBoyy20(Samm). Prabhanjay Tiwari (Sanju Supporter). Kaashish Vohra ((as Kashish Vora)). Arshad Warsi (Self). Abhay Kulkarni (Constable (uncredited)). Abhinay Raj Singh (Town Boy Akshay (uncredited)). Surender Thakur (Bandu Dada’s Henchmen (uncredited))

Language Hindi

Producers Syed Zaid Ali. Zohaib Ali. Aleem Allie. Nizam Allie. Mehboob Bawa. Vidhu Vinod Chopra. Noorie Hassan. Rajkumar Hirani. Hetvi Karia. Sahil Khosla. Ilana Rossein. Sachin Utekar

Production Fluiidmask Studio. Rajkumar Hirani Film. Vinod Chopra Production
